title: A Java Readable description of the resources available to a SpiNNaker machine.

width.description: The width of the system in chips

height.description: The height of the system in chips

root.description: The x and y coordinates of the chip used to boot the machine

items.description: The x coordinates of the chip used to boot the machine
The y coordinates of the chip used to boot the machine

ethernetResources.description: Expected Resources on each Ethernet connected chip

standardResources.description: Expected Resources on each none Ethernet connected chip

items.description: The x coordinates of the chip
The y coordinates of the chip
The specific details of this chip

details.description: Details that differ for each Chip

cores.description: Total number of cores on the chip incluing monitors.

deadLinks.description: List of any missing/ dead links on the chip. Including ones missing because the Chip is on an edge. If missing there are no dead links.

ethernet.description: X and Y coordinates of the nearest Ethernet Chip to this Chip

items.description: X coordinate of the nearest Ethernet Chip to this Chip
Y coordinate of the nearest Ethernet Chip to this Chip

ipAddress.description: Ip Address of this Chip or missing if this is a standard therefor none Ethernet Chip

links.description: Information for links that can not be auto computed

source_link_id.description: Link id on the source Chip's router

destination_x.description: X coordinate of the destination chip.

destination_y.description: Y coordinate of the destination chip.

resources.description: Details that are expected to be the same on each Chip.

routerEntries.description: Number of entries in the routing table.

tags.description: Ids of the tags available and usable.

virtual.description: Is this an actual chip or a connected thing.
